com.camerontec.catalys.mis.eps.jmx

Interface IObservationProcessingEngineMXBean


  • public interface IObservationProcessingEngineMXBean
    Specifies the JMX interface into the Observation Processing Engine

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Retrieves the interest retry interval.

    • Method Detail

      • startAllInterests

        void startAllInterests()
                throws ExecutionException,
                       InterruptedException
        Attempts to start all interests that have been registered with the Observation Processing Engine. Any interest that cannot be started immediately is held in a WAITING state and as soon as the condition that prevented it starting is resolved it will be started. A missing shared Esper module or an undefined event will prevent the interest from starting.
        Throws:
        ExecutionException - on execution exception
        InterruptedException - if interrupted

      • stopAllInterests

        void stopAllInterests()
               throws ExecutionException,
                      InterruptedException
        Stops all interests registered with the Observation Processing Engine. All interests are moved to the STOPPED state from either the STARTED or WAITING state.
        Throws:
        ExecutionException - on execution exception
        InterruptedException - if interrupted

      • startInterest

        void startInterest(String interest)
            throws ExecutionException,
                   InterruptedException
        Attempts to start a single interest registered with the Observation Processing Engine. See startAllInterests() for behaviour when the interest cannot be started immediately.
        Parameters:
        interest - the interest id
        Throws:
        ExecutionException - on execution exception
        InterruptedException - if interrupted

      • stopInterest

        void stopInterest(String interest)
           throws ExecutionException,
                  InterruptedException
        Stops the named interest. The interest is moved to the STOPPED state from either STARTED or WAITING
        Parameters:
        interest - the interest id
        Throws:
        ExecutionException - on execution exception
        InterruptedException - if interrupted

      • getFailedInterestRetryInterval

        long getFailedInterestRetryInterval()
        Retrieves the interest retry interval. If an interest fails its validation it is checked again after this number of milliseconds.
        Returns:
        the interest retry interval

      • setFailedInterestRetryInterval

        void setFailedInterestRetryInterval(long failedInterestRetryInterval)
        Sets for the interest retry interval
        Parameters:
        failedInterestRetryInterval -
